text: Izaskun Bengoa Pérez (born 14 March 1975) is a road cyclist from Spain. She represented her nation at the 1996 Summer Olympics on the road in the women's road race and on the track in the women's points race. ==References== ==External links== * profile at sports-reference.com Category:Spanish female cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Spain Category:Living people Category:People from Bilbao Category:1975 births
title: Izaskun Bengoa
